alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Meade (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 3:21PM MDT until May 30 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL MEADE AND NORTHEASTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 321 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Saint Onge, or 5 miles east of Spearfish, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Spearfish, Whitewood and Saint Onge. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 14 and 27. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
